subject: Economy
explanation_en: National income refers to the total value of goods and services produced within a country in a given period of time, typically a year. In contrast, GDP (Gross Domestic Product) is the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders, irrespective of the nationality of the producers.

explanation_en: Indian Economy refers to the overall economic performance and development of the country. GDP (Gross Domestic Product) is the total value of goods and services produced within a country in a specific time period, usually a year. It is an important economic indicator.

subject: Economics
question_en: What is the role of government in economic growth?
B_en: Government also plays a role in setting up industries
explanation_en: The government is responsible for regulating policies and maintaining a stable economic environment.

subject: Economics
question_en: What is the role of free trade?
explanation_en: Free trade allows countries to buy and sell goods and services without any restrictions or tariffs

subject: Economics
question_en: What is the balance between demand and supply?
explanation_en: Demand and Supply determine the price
